trans-unit.source: Contains values of properties that a component might need only occasionally.
trans-unit.target: Contiene valores de propiedades que un componente podría necesitar en ocasiones.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag> class enables a class to appear to have properties it really does not have.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag> clase permite que una clase parezca que tiene propiedades que no tiene realmente.

trans-unit.source: The class can then use the properties when needed, and save on memory when the class does not use the properties.
trans-unit.target: La clase, a continuación, puede utilizar las propiedades cuando sea necesario y guardarlas en memoria cuando la clase no utiliza las propiedades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag> is used internally to the .NET Framework, and its constructors are private.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag> se usa internamente para .NET Framework, y sus constructores son privados.

trans-unit.source: You cannot create an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag>.
trans-unit.target: No se puede crear una instancia de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag>.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Valor <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Valor <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the component.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el color de fondo del componente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the background color of the component.
trans-unit.target: Control <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> que representa el color de fondo del componente.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag" /> to be copied.
trans-unit.target: El <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag" /> que se va a copiar.

trans-unit.source: Copies an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag" />.
trans-unit.target: Copia un control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag" />.

trans-unit.source: A new copy of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Nueva copia del control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font of the text displayed by the component.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece la fuente del texto que muestra el componente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to apply to the text displayed by the component.
trans-unit.target: Control <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> que se va a aplicar al texto que muestra el componente.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the component.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el color de primer plano del componente.

trans-unit.source: The foreground color of the component.
trans-unit.target: Color de primer plano del componente.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag" /> contains all default values.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve un valor si el control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag" /> contiene todos los valores predeterminados.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag" /> contains all default values; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si el control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag" /> contiene todos los valores predeterminados; en caso contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> que se rellena con datos.

trans-unit.source: The destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: Destino de esta serialización.

trans-unit.source: Populates the specified <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> with the data needed to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: Llena el objeto <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> especificado con los datos necesarios para serializar el objeto destino.

trans-unit.source: for providing serialization services.
trans-unit.target: para proporcionar servicios de serialización.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SerializationFormatter" />.
trans-unit.target: Enumeración asociada: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SerializationFormatter" />.
